scripts.start: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js get -p 80
scripts.post: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js -p 80 post -h Content-Type:application/json -d {'Assignment': 1} http://httpbin.org/post
scripts.postByFile: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js -p 80 post -h Content-Type:application/json -f C:\projects\node-httpc\input.json http://httpbin.org/post
scripts.redirect: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js get http://rml.lu/MQvh7V
